name: Kobold Broodguard Dragon Servitor
description: The Kobold Broodguard is a small humanoid with vibrant scales, serving as a guardian for dragonkind. Equipped with a shield and a unique bill hook, it embodies the traits typical of kobolds, including adaptability and a fierce loyalty to dragons.
memorable: This creature excels in coordinated pack tactics and can bolster its allies while striking effectively in melee with additional damage when it has the advantage.
goals: To protect its dragon master and eliminate threats to dragonkind.
relations: Usually found alongside dragons and other kobolds, serving them loyally.
environment: Commonly found in lairs and caves associated with dragons.
strengths: Highly effective in group combat scenarios with advantages from Pack Tactics, significant melee capabilities, and support through Rally!
weaknesses: Struggles in bright sunlight, which imposes disadvantage on its attacks and perception.
attacks: Utilizes a bill hook for slashing attacks, can knock smaller foes prone, a spiked shield for piercing damage, and a sling for ranged assaults.
most_powerful_ability: Rally! can empower nearby kobolds, providing immunity to fear and a damage boost for their next attack.
additional_information: Pack Tactics grants advantage on attack rolls in group combat.
Dragons Blood provides resistance to a specific damage type.
Ominous Shadow allows better performance in combat when near its master.
Draconic Smite enhances melee attacks when having advantage.
Can effectively support allied kobolds in battle.
